title: Duke Energy brings $100M, 50-MW battery online at former coal site
description: Duke Energy launched a 50-MW battery storage system at its former Allen coal plant, serving North Carolina and South Carolina customers.
content: Duke Energy launched a 50-MW battery storage system at its former Allen coal plant, serving North Carolina and South Carolina customers.
